label: Wolf
description: Guardian of the threshold. Appears in dreams of exile, wild memory, and initiation.

label: Squash
description: Feminine fertility, ancestral agriculture, sustenance and grounded abundance.

label: Fire
description: The purifying flame. Desire, transformation, destruction and light.

label: Water
description: Emotion, the unconscious, the lunar tides of feeling and return.

label: Air
description: Breath, speech, clarity, and invisible threads of connection.

label: Earth
description: Ground, memory, soil, home. The slow turning of time into form.

label: Motherhood
description: Birthgiver, nurturer, and the sacrifice of self for life’s continuation.

label: Death
description: The great return. The dissolver of form, the truth behind all stories.

label: Revolution
description: Uprising, cyclical turning, transformation of the collective will.

label: Freedom
description: Unbound spirit, wild action, and the right to choose one’s dance.

label: Trickster
description: Shapeshifter, sacred fool, destroyer of fixed truths. The laughter beneath control.

label: Healer
description: One who descends into pain and returns bearing medicine. Carries both wound and cure.

label: Initiation
description: A rupture in the known. The descent that leads to a greater return.

label: Duality
description: The pull between opposites: light and shadow, freedom and order.

label: Underworld
description: The buried, the unseen, the place of shadow integration and ancestral voice.

label: Seed
description: Beginning in stillness. A compact of potential, memory, and future.

label: Dream
description: The vision beyond logic. Nonlinear insight. The mapless compass of soul.

label: Sacrifice
description: The sacred exchange. Giving something to make room for something greater.

label: Rain
description: Tears of the sky. Nourishment, grief, and the blessing that follows dryness.

label: Mirror
description: Reflection, reversal, the dance of self and other. Shadow work and insight.
